Trade/Device Name(s): LabonaCheck® Gluppy Blood Glucose Monitoring System
LabonaCheck® Gluppy Blood Glucose Test Strips
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LabonaCheck® Gluppy Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip by a single person for self-testing at home to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
